snippet: An East Tennessee grand jury has cleared a pastor who has appeared on a reality television show about snake handling of possessing venomous snakes.
abstract: East Tennessee grand jury has cleared pastor Andrew Hamblin, who has appeared on reality television show Snake Salvation, about snake handling, on charges of possessing venomous snakes.
lead_paragraph: An East Tennessee grand jury has cleared a pastor who has appeared on a reality television show about snake handling of possessing venomous snakes.

headline.main: Tennessee: Pastor Is Cleared in Snake-Handling Case
headline.print_headline: Tennessee: Pastor Is Cleared in Snake-Handling Case
